name: Ranger
uniques: May upgrade to [Colony Rifleman] through ruins-like effects <with [50]% chance>
May upgrade to [Colony Marksman] through ruins-like effects <with [50]% chance>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: The best soldiers of the EDF, the rangers are experienced in fighting monsters and aliens.

name: BlueJacket Snipers (Ranger)
uniques: Can only be built <in cities with a [Mercenary Offices]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: When a ranger becomes experienced, he is trained to use a sniper. These weapons are deadly on the battlefield.

name: Wing Diver
uniques: Can upgrade to [Heavy Heli Gunship] <after discovering [Nanotechnology]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: These soldiers are equipped with plasma weapons and can fly.

name: Spriggan Team (Wing Diver)
uniques: [10]% Strength bonus for [Infantry] units within [1] tiles
Can only be built <in cities with a [Mercenary Offices]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: These elite wing divers inspire the troops around them.

name: Air Raider
uniques: Must set up to ranged attack
[100]% Strength bonus for [Air] units within [3] tiles
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: These soldiers do not use guns but radios. They communicate with bombers and bases to designate targets and hit enemies more precisely.

name: Fencer
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: Advanced soldiers with powered armor that improves their strength and speed. They also carry shields that can block attacks.

name: Grim Reapers (Fencer)
uniques: Can only be built <in cities with a [Mercenary Offices]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: These legendary soldiers destroyed 3 Assault Mechs by themselves.

name: Spritefall
uniques: Destroys tile improvements when attacking <with [25]% chance>
Can only be built <in cities with a [Orbital Launch Facility]>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: This weapon of light can kill anything even gods!
